author: cstamas
msg: MINDEXER-1: adding ability to defer member selection.

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-4932: Make VTITemplate abstractly extend a base class which implements the full JDBC 3.0 ResultSet api; this alows developers to use both the java 5 and java 6 compilers when building table functions which extend VTITemplate and StringColumnVTI.

author: lhazlewood
msg: Updated trunk to reflect version 1.2.0-SNAPSHOT to reflect forward-incompatible changes and new features.  Any point release (1.1.x) bug fixes will be done in the branches/shiro-root-1.1.x branch and merged into the trunk.
